reviewText: Used this for my DSC 340 class (Data Mining class).This book does a great job with overviews. By that, I mean it explains a general topic fairly well. However, when it comes down to "how to" steps, the book is of almost no help. If there are "how-to" guides, they are very poorly written and extremely hard to follow. For most topics, it simply compares and contrasts different how to methods without actually explaining how to do them.
title: Data Mining for Business Intelligence: Concepts, Techniques, and Applications in Microsoft Office Excel with XLMiner
